text: 12:32 Jon 3:14; 8:28; Rom 5:18; Hibru 2:9Datɨrɨghɨn kɨ nguazimɨn iti, ezɨ gɨn me ter ighuvimɨn na guragham, eghtɨ dughiar kamɨn kɨ gumazamiziba bar me damutɨ me na bagh izam.”12:32 Iesus ghaze, “Gumaziba na fegh ter ighuvimɨn na aguragham.” Tuavir kamra, God a feghtɨ an an Nguibamɨn mangɨ, egh bar pɨn ikiam. Nɨ Filipai 2:9-11ɨn gan.
